title: Enhancing Social Issue Analysis Competencies through Multimedia Simulation Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Conducting social phenomenon analysis projects in simulation environments utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze social issues presented in simulation-based learning environments
Learners can accurately explain the interconnections of complex social systems by 80% or more using narrative-style instructions
Learners can design solutions for real-world social problems using PBL (Project-Based Learning) methods with digital simulation tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
